pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How PlayCrick Protects Your Data and Ensures Privacy +91-983-4581481 playcrick@gmail.com PlayCrick Home Why are we Advantages Functions Impression Contact Privacy Policy Information Sharing and Disclosure We may share or disclose your personal information in the following circumstances: Service Providers: Your information may be shared with third-party service providers who offer services on our behalf, including but not limited to payment processing, data analysis, email distribution, hosting, and customer support. Business Transfers: Should a merger, acquisition, or sale of any or all of our assets occur, your information may be transferred to the entity acquiring the business. Aggregated and Anonymized Data: We might share aggregated or anonymized data, which does not personally identify you, with third parties for purposes such as industry analysis and demographic profiling. Cookies and Similar Technologies: Our service providers and we may use cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies to gather information regarding your interaction with our Services. This data can help us analyze trends, manage the Services, monitor user activity on the Services, and collect demographic information about our overall user base. While you can control cookie usage through your browser settings, disabling cookies may restrict access to some features or functions of our Services. Changes to This Privacy Policy: This Privacy Policy may be revised periodically. The updated policy will be identified by a "Revised" date and will take effect as soon as it is accessible. We recommend that you review this Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your information. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at playcrick@gmail.com. pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines for Playing PlayCrick Mobile Cricket Game +91-983-4581481 playсrick@gmail.com PlayCrick Home Why are we Advantages Functions Impression Contact Terms of Use In-App Purchases and Virtual Currency PlayCrick may offer in-app purchases, including virtual currency, items, or services ("In-App Purchases"). You acknowledge and agree that you are fully responsible for managing your In-App Purchases and the amount you spend on In-App Purchases within the application. All In-App Purchases are final and non-refundable, except as required by law. Prices and availability of In-App Purchases are subject to change without notice. You may only purchase In-App Purchases from us or our authorized partners through the application and not in any other way. Virtual currency or items may never be redeemed for "real world", goods, or other items of monetary value from PlayCrick or any other party. You understand that you have no right, title, interest, or ownership in or to any virtual currency or items appearing or originating in PlayCrick, or any other attributes associated with your account or stored on PlayCrick's servers. Security PlayCrick takes reasonable measures to protect your information in connection with the application. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer or mobile device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. Copyright Policy PlayCrick respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects its users to do the same. If you believe that any content on PlayCrick infringes upon your copyright, please provide our Copyright Agent with the following information: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at that site. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit PlayCrick to locate the material. Information reasonably sufficient to permit PlayCrick to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be contacted. A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. PlayCrick's Copyright Agent for notice of claims of copyright infringement can be reached at playcrick@gmail.com. PlayCrick Home Why are we Advantages Functions Impression Contact Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of use 18+ Copyright © 2024 PlayCrick. All rights reserved.
